version_description:
- CGE online web with player profiles, achievements and friend lists
   Chat with your friends and fellow truckers easily, and see what they are up to.

- Saving campaign progress into cloud
   And carry it over to your other device.

- Turn-based games start automatically
   No waiting for the creator of the game to starting it manually, the game will start itself when everyone is ready.

- Real-time games more user-friendly
  The game remain in the lobby easy to reach. 

- Better notifications
  We let you know when someone reserves a slot in a game for you and when your time is close to run out in a game.

- Bug fixes and improvements to online stability
- Minor user interface enhancement

- Play online on your mobile network â€“ our galactic providers now support IPv6
- Fly your ships on iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, and iPhone XR
- Versatile blue aliens have made some improvements and fixed various bugs

- fixed login issues
- fixed minor cloud save and sync problems
- other small bug fixes and improvements

- UI improvements for wide aspect ratio and cutout devices
- stability improvements
- minor bug fixes
